languages.text: "На мире Даргонус состоялась Магнэ Ацессио. {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость {name} — нов{mf|ый|ая} держатель{mf||ница} Патента Вольного Торговца и глава династии фон Валанциус!"
"Magnae Accessio takes place on Dargonus! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} pronounced new holder of Rogue Trader Warrant and head of von Valancius dynasty!"
languages.original_text: "На мире Даргонус состоялась Магнэ Ацессио. {mf|Его|Ее} Светлость {name} — нов{mf|ый|ая} держатель{mf||ница} Патента Вольного Торговца и глава династии фон Валанциус!"

traits.locale_text: "Magnae Accessio takes place on world of Dargonus! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} pronounced new holder of Rogue Trader Warrant and head of von Valancius dynasty!"
"Magnae Accessio takes place on world of Dargonus! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} pronounced new holder of Rogue Trader Warrant and head of von Valancius dynasty!"
"Magnae Accessio takes place on Dargonus! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} pronounced new holder of Rogue Trader Warrant and head of von Valancius dynasty!"
"Magnae Accessio takes place on Dargonus! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} pronounced new holder of Rogue Trader Warrant and head of von Valancius dynasty!"
"Magnae Accessio takes place on Dargonus! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} pronounced new holder of Rogue Trader Warrant and head of von Valancius dynasty!"

languages.text: “继任颂典将在达戈努斯举行！{name}大人将成为行商浪人授状的新任持有者，以及冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的首领！”
languages.original_text: "Magnae Accessio takes place on Dargonus! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} pronounced new holder of Rogue Trader Warrant and head of von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: “继任颂典将在达戈努斯举行！{name}大人将成为行商浪人许可证的新任持有者，以及冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的首领！”

languages.text: «¡La Magnae Accessio tiene lugar en Dargonus! ¡Su señoría {name} se proclamó {mf|portador|portadora} de la Patente de los Comerciantes Independientes y líder de la dinastía von Valancius!».
languages.original_text: "Magnae Accessio takes place on Dargonus! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} pronounced new holder of Rogue Trader Warrant and head of von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: "¡La Magnae Accessio tiene lugar en Dargonus! ¡Su señoría {name} se proclamó {mf|portador|portadora} de la Patente de los Comerciantes Independientes y líder de la dinastía von Valancius!».

languages.text: 「マグナ・アクセシオをダルゴナスにて開催！{name}陛下が自由開拓者の令状の新たな保持者およびフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の君主であることを宣言した！」
languages.original_text: "Magnae Accessio takes place on Dargonus! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} pronounced new holder of Rogue Trader Warrant and head of von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: 「マグナ・アクセシオをダルゴナスにて開催！{name}陛下が自由開拓者の令状の新たな保持者およびフォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の君主であることを宣言した！」

languages.text: "Magnae Accessio auf Dargonus! {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} {name} hat Freihändler-Handelsbrief erhalten und führt nun die Dynastie von Valancius an!"
languages.original_text: "Magnae Accessio takes place on Dargonus! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} pronounced new holder of Rogue Trader Warrant and head of von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: "Magnae Accessio auf Dargonus! {mf|Seine Lordschaft|Ihre Ladyschaft} {name} hat Freihändler-Handelsbrief erhalten und führt nun die Dynastie von Valancius an!"

languages.text: « La Magnae Accessio se déroule sur Dargonus ! Sa Seigneurie {name} a officiellement reçu une lettre de marque de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} et pris la tête de la dynastie von Valancius ! »
languages.original_text: "Magnae Accessio takes place on Dargonus! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} pronounced new holder of Rogue Trader Warrant and head of von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: « La Magnae Accessio se déroule sur Dargonus ! Sa Seigneurie {name} a officiellement reçu une lettre de marque de {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} et pris la tête de la dynastie von Valancius ! »

languages.text: "Dargonus'ta Magnae Accessio gerçekleşti! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri {name}, Hür Tacir Ruhsatnamesi'nin yeni sahibi olup von Valancius hanedanlığının yeni lideri ilan edildi!"
languages.original_text: "Magnae Accessio takes place on Dargonus! {mf|His Lordship|Her Ladyship} {name} pronounced new holder of Rogue Trader Warrant and head of von Valancius dynasty!"

traits.locale_text: "Dargonus'ta Magnae Accessio gerçekleşti! {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri {name}, Hür Tacir Ruhsatname'sinin yeni sahibi ve von Valancius hanedanlığının yeni lideri ilan edildi!"
